tns:patch.author: Alex
tns:patch.description: Adding adjustment type name to the component view

script.lang:
DROP VIEW v_component_funding;
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_component_funding AS SELECT f.activity_id AS amp_activity_id, f.amp_component_funding_id, f.amp_component_funding_id AS amp_fund_detail_id, c.title AS component_name, f.transaction_type, f.adjustment_type, adj.category_value as adjustment_type_name, f.transaction_date, f.transaction_amount, f.currency_id, cu.currency_code FROM amp_component_funding f, amp_components c, amp_currency cu, amp_category_value adj WHERE cu.amp_currency_id = f.currency_id AND f.amp_component_id = c.amp_component_id AND f.adjustment_type = adj.id ORDER BY f.activity_id;
